sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SINOPLE, in heraldry, denotes vert, or green colour in armories.—Sinople is uſed to ſignify love, youth, beauty, rejoicing, and liberty ; whence it is that letters of grace, ambition, legitimation, & c. are always ſealed with green wax.
